metadata.title: Rihanna - Bitch Better Have My Money (Explicit)
metadata.creator: Rihanna

tracks.text: The following program is rated Mature for Language, Nudity, and Violence. Viewer discretion advised.
Bloody legs hang out of a box on a lawn that overlooks a valley with palm trees.
A blond woman in a white lacy nightgown applies makeup.
A blue car drives up a hill at night.
Rihanna is the driver. She has straight brown hair, a trench coat, black lipstick, and black driving gloves.
She struggles to pull a heavy box out of the trunk.
The blond woman walks around a richly furnished room wearing tailored white pants and a see-through bra.
She puts on a jacket, picks up a pomeranian, and kisses a man who faces away from us.
Rihanna drags the heavy box up several stairs to a house.
The blond woman carries a pomerian and exits a hotel room. She calls an elevator.
Rihanna stands in the elevator with a box. She has red curly hair, a pinstripe jacket, a red skirt, and red leather boots.
When the elevator opens again, Rihanna holds the pomeranian, and the blond woman is gone.
Rihanna drags the heavy box. The dog wanders off. In a parking garage, Rihanna smokes, while 2 women load the box into a blue car.
Rihanna drives down a road. An Indian woman sits in the passenger seat, and a white woman wearing a choker sits in the back. The blond woman, completely naked, lies in the back seat.
The Indian woman drags the blond woman into a barn. Her teeth have braces that are tied together. She swings upside down by a chain.
Rihanna talks to someone on the phone, while dodging the swinging naked woman.
The car pulls up to a gas station. Rihanna gets out, wearing a denim trench coat, knee length denim skirt, and corset with zipper.
Rihanna raps to us in the parking lot. The Indian woman grabs snacks. The white woman pumps gas. They throw a bag of chips in the box.
Rihanna hits throws a payphone, then walks back to her car at the gas station.
At night in the desert. The car is on fire. The white woman drags the box away.
Rihanna's associates shove the box into a truck, while Rihanna smokes.
Rihanna, sits on a pool chair on a boat. The white woman sits in a yellow bikini, and looks out with binoculars. The blond woman throws up into a red bucket.
The boat has a large crane on it. It says 'Catalina Freight Line'.
The indian woman sits in a 10 foot inflatable pool with the blond woman.  They are both naked. The indian woman plays with an inflatable shark.
Rihanna yells at her phone, throws it over the side, pulls out a gun, and shoots the phone in mid-air.
The 4 women sit outside in lawn chairs. A sheriff's car pulls up. The blond woman starts to get up.
The indian woman breaks a glass over the blond woman's head. The sheriff's deputy drives by. The girls wave. Rihanna waves the blond woman's hand.
Rihanna pulls up to a motel. Her associates drag the box out of the car.
The indian woman does the blond woman's hair and makeup, while she's blindfolded.
Rihanna lights a bong.
The blond woman takes a hit. Everyone drinks and plays with flashlights.
The 4 women laugh. They have distorted vision. Rihanna smokes.
In the day time, Rihanna swims in a pool with an inflatable aligator. The sheriff's deputy walks up to her.
She waves at the deputy. Beneath the water, the blond woman holds her breath.
At night, the motel room is full of neon lights. The women drink from a Grey Goose bottle, passing it around.
Rihanna, with straight red hair and black lipstick, drives a car at night.
She pulls the box out of her car and starts to drag it. The associates come over, and she drops the box.
She looks at weapons. The associates open the box, where the blond woman lies, naked, in the fetal position.
Rihanna picks up a chainsaw labelled 'Cheater'. Other weapons are labelled 'Dead Beat Dad', 'Said It Wasn't His', 'Left the Toilet Seat Up', 'Didn't Notice', 'Fucked up my credit', and 'BBHMM'.
Rihanna picks up a small knife. She wears black plastic gloves, and a transparent plastic bikini. She turns.
Man is saran wrapped to a chair. Text appears. The Accountant, aka 'The Bitch'.
A series of flashbacks. The blond woman kisses the accountant when she left the hotel room.
As the blond woman swings upside down, Rihanna is on the phone. The accountant is on the phone in a club. At the gas station, Rihanna kicks an ATM, which says 'Available balance: $420.'
She mouths 'What the fuck?' on the phone. The accountant sits in a bed with 2 naked women who throw cash around.
Account balance: $0. Rihanna approaches the accountant. Account balance: Fuck you.
The accountant tries to push away. His lip trembles. He closes his eyes.
Legs covered in blood lay outside of a box.
Rihanna lies, naked, covered in blood, in a box full of cash. She lights a cigarette. Fade to black.
White text on a red background. BBHMM.
Rihanna looks at us with a determined expression. Her face and hair stream with blood. Cut to black.
